home.subtitle: You can share your travelling experiences here!

home.question: If you have any question on Prepared Adventurer:
home.routesfaq: You can create the routes that you have done when travelling, and checkout other users routes!
home.pointofinterestfaq: Check out the points of interest that you can see in the world, and add your own!
home.ratingsfaq: You can rate the points of interests and routes available in the site, and check other people's opinions!
home.tagsfaq: Explore the tags that our users created, and check out the premium content!
home.followedfaq: Check again the routes that you are following!
